welcome_message_body: Welcome to Acilia, a charming city known for its beautiful architecture, delicious cuisine, and rich history. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that this vibrant city has to offer. Buon viaggio!

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Primarily used for low-cost carriers and charter flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: Dedicated to international flights for airlines such as Alitalia and Delta.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi for up to 6 hours.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ciampino Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Ciampino Airport, mainly used for budget airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
